name: find markiplier
description:
Note: I will not publish a web build because of this. if you would like to do web builds for me, the source code is on GitHub (see below)

this game is open source for some reason: https://github.com/RealMCoded/find-markiplier

Your goal: Find Markiplier

Features:

- High quality Soundtrack (wow!)

- Markiplier

-Highscore System (NEVER DONE BEFORE :O)

Controls:

Mouse Left Click - Confirm if you Found Markiplier

R - Reset the round (if you can't find him)
